sandra.examples.asr.asrwithintent
Class ASRWithIntent

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  sandra.examples.asr.asrwithintent.ASRWithIntent
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
public class ASRWithIntent
extends android.app.Activity

ASRWithIntent: Basic app with ASR using a RecognizerIntent Simple demo in which the user speaks and the recognition results are showed in a list along with their confidence values The code for this app is self-contained: it uses an Intent for speech recognition. The rest of the apps in the book employ a special ASR library (ASRLib).

Version:
1.6, 11/24/13
Author:
Zoraida Callejas, Michael McTear

onActivityResult

protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                int resultCode,
                                android.content.Intent data)
Shows the formatted best of N best recognition results (N-best list) from best to worst in the ListView. For each match, it will render the recognized phrase and the confidence with which it was recognized.

Overrides:
onActivityResult in class android.app.Activity
